lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court stayed an order from a trial judge directing the military to allow openly gay people to serve.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

snippet: A federal appeals court stayed an order from a trial judge directing the military to allow openly gay people to serve.

headline.main: Military Policy on Gays to Stand, Pending Appeal
headline.seo: ‘Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell’ Remains While Appeal Is Heard
